rukus.text: 2|1|Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu.
2|2|Zhe bu jing, qizhong hao wu keyi, shi jingwei zhe de xiangdao.
2|3|Tamen quexin youxuan, jin shou bai gong, bing fen she wo suo gei yu tamen de.
2|4|Tamen quexin jiang shi ni de jingdian, he zai ni yiqian jiang shi de jingdian, bingqie duxin houshi.
2|5|Zhe deng ren, shi zunshou tamen de zhu de zhengdao de; zhe deng ren, que shi chenggong de.
2|6|Buxindao zhe, ni dui tamen jiayi jinggao yu fou, zhe zai tamen shi yiyang de, tamen bijing bu xindao.
2|7|An la yi fengbile tamen de xin he er, tamen de yan shang you yi mo; tamen jiang shou zhongda de xingfa.
